import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { Header, Icon, Form, Image, Message, Segment, Grid, Modal, Search, Button, Dimmer, Loader, Divider, Item, Dropdown, Select } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const Registration_Fourth = ({ formData, setForm, navigation }) => { const { COUNSELLOR_PHOTO, COUNSELLOR_FIRST_NAME, COUNSELLOR_LAST_NAME, COUNSELLOR_HEADLINE, COUNSELLOR_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION } = formData; const { handleSubmit, register, errors } = useForm({ }); const onSubmit = (data) => { navigation.next() }; console.log(formData) return (

About

{COUNSELLOR_FIRST_NAME} {COUNSELLOR_LAST_NAME}

About the Counsellor
) } export default Registration_Fourth;
